name: FANantics
description:
What better place to root for your favorite sports team than the local library!

Celebrate your favorite sports team by cheering them on while avoiding the gaze of the pesky librarians checking in on you. Keep your eyes peeled, those librarians are crafty. They seem to come from almost anywhere to catch you misusing the library equipment (computers are in demand I suppose). Don't let those cunning catalogers ruin your Sunday! 

Hold SPACE to root for your sports team and click the buttons that appear in the correct numerical order to gain points.

Release SPACE whenever the librarians POPOUT to check on you.

Objects will shake whenever someone is coming to check on you. Sometimes it may NOT be a librarian, so pay attention to maximize your score!

(NOTE FOR MAC: To bypass security settings, go to System Prefs -> Security -> and select the "Open Anyway" option).
